resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103469</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103469</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207156</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sunday School Books: Shaping the Values of Youth in Nineteenth-Century America</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonntagsschule Bücher: Formen der Werte von
Jugend im 19.-Jahrhundert Amerika</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Livres D'École de Dimanche : Formation des 
valeurs de la jeunesse en Dix-neuvième-Siècle Amérique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Livros Da Escola De Domingo: Dando forma aos
valores da juventude no Décimo-Século América</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Libri Della Scuola Di Domenica: Modellatura 
dei valori della gioventù nel Diciannovesimo-Secolo America</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχολικά βιβλία της Κυριακής: Διαμόρφωση των 
τιμών της νεολαίας στον δέκατος-αιώνα Αμερική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Libros De la Escuela De Domingo: Formar los 
valores de la juventud en el Diecinueveavo-Siglo América</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">presents 170 Sunday school books published in America between 1815 and 1865. They document the culture of religious instruction of youth during the Antebellum era and illustrate thematic divisions that preoccupied 19th-century America.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschenke 170 Sonntagsschule Bücher 
veröffentlichten in Amerika zwischen 1815 und 1865. Sie 
dokumentieren die Kultur der frommen Anweisung von Jugend während der
Antebellum Ära und veranschaulichen thematische Abteilungen, die 
19th-century Amerika in Anspruch nahmen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les présents 170 livres d'école de dimanche ont 
édité en Amérique entre 1815 et 1865. Ils documentent la 
culture de l'instruction religieuse de la jeunesse pendant l'ère 
d'avant-guerre et illustrent les divisions thématiques qui ont 
préoccupé 19th-century Amérique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os presentes 170 livros da escola de domingo 
publicaram em América entre 1815 e 1865. Documentam a cultura 
da instrução religiosa da juventude durante a era antebellum e 
ilustram as divisões thematic que preoccupied 19th-century América.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i presenti 170 libri della scuola di domenica 
hanno pubblicato in America fra 1815 e 1865. Documentano la 
coltura di istruzione religiosa della gioventù durante l'era 
antebellum ed illustrano le divisioni tematiche che hanno preoccupato 
19th-century America.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρουσιάζει 170 σχολικά βιβλία της Κυριακής που 
δημοσιεύονται στην Αμερική μεταξύ 1815 και 1865. 
Τεκμηριώνουν τον πολιτισμό της θρησκευτικής οδηγίας της 
νεολαίας κατά τη διάρκεια της προπολεμικής εποχής και επεξηγούν 
τα θεματικά τμήματα που ανησύχησαν τον 19$ος-αιώνα Αμερική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los presentes 170 libros de la escuela de domingo 
publicaron en América entre 1815 y 1865. Documentan la cultura 
de la instrucción religiosa de la juventud durante la era antebellum 
e ilustran las divisiones temáticas que preocuparon 19th-century 
América.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207156</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103469</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/sunday-school-books-shaping-the-values-of-youth-in-nineteenth-century-america</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
